title: Vert Midi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Eco-friendly salad bar restaurant where the furniture is all antique and/or reclaimed. Offers several main dishes and soups, with the main appeal being the made-to-order salad bar. Choose your base of lettuce, quinoa, or pasta; then range of toppings each priced separately; and served in an edible bowl. Sodas, fresh juices, and smoothies for beverages. The flatware is re-useable and the restaurant tries to minimize waste as much as possible.
